six_command_system.description: Complete parallel logging system with progress and technical commands
six_command_system.principle: Progress commands for project updates, technical commands for code details

consol.content_focus: Current accomplishments, next priorities, blocking issues
consol.references: Current day's previous p-mini files matching [CURRENT-DATE]-*

end_sesh.content_focus: Session summary, key accomplishments, context updates
end_sesh.references: ALL current day files from p-mini-consolidations and t-mini-changes

end_day.content_focus: Complete daily summary, major achievements, project impact
end_day.references: ALL current day files from ALL folders (p-mini, p-session, t-daily, t-session, t-mini)

code.content_focus: File changes, function modifications, bug fixes
code.references: Current day's previous t-mini files matching [CURRENT-DATE]-*

end_code.references: ALL current day files from t-mini-changes and p-mini-consolidations

end_tech.content_focus: Complete technical summary, code architecture, implementation details
end_tech.references: ALL current day files from ALL folders (t-mini, t-session, p-daily, p-session, p-mini)

dynamic_date_scanning.current_date: Use `date "+%Y-%m-%d"` for daily files and scanning
dynamic_date_scanning.cross_referencing: Progress and technical commands reference each other's same-day files
